name: Federation of Associations of Utilities Companies in Energy field
goal: to represent the interest of the members (companies of transport, distribution and supply of electricity and natural gas) in dialog with the authorities and trade unions
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: energy policies, European legislation, European Comission, DG Energy, DG Competition
